participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and ambitious, with a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I have a pug who is my best friend. I have one little girl. I am plotting on taking over the world. My weight is normal. I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Supportive and dedicated, with a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_2.background: I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym. I drive a blue honda civic. I have a set of identical twin brothers. My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms. I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

content.text: I have a pug who is my best friend.
That is awesome, I have identical twin brothers.
I grew up with my best friends, they've been close ever since.
Wow, that is awesome, I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.
I am plotting on taking over the world, but my pug would never let me.
Haha, I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
I have one little girl, she is the light of my life.
That is great, my worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I am sorry to hear that. How do you cope with that?
I try to stay positive, and know that I am doing important work.
Thanks, how do you keep yourself motivated?
I just love my pug, and she keeps me going.
That is so sweet, you seem like an awesome person.
Thanks, you seem pretty awesome yourself.
